11413.content:
Jordan slept on the couch with a smile on her face. It wasn’t such a shock when you consider what had just happened to her. She had just been fed more than half of a very tasty pizza. She was filled to the brim and her fat belly was bigger than ever. All those things were more than enough to make a little feedee like her grin as her round belly went to work on the food inside it.

She wasn’t the only one grinning of course. Her feeder sister was more than pleased with the results of what had happened. You see the most amount of pizza Jenny could get little Jordan to eat was a 6 slices. Not only was she able to get her plump little sis to down an extra piece, but she was able to stuff her with TWO extra pieces! She was extremely excited about that.

Jordan sat there watching TV, waiting for their mother to arrive. She sat next to where her sleeping sister laid and she carefully fished under the covers until she found the large dome of Jordan’s fat little belly, rubbing it soothingly as the little girl slept. Jordan would only smile a little more in her sleep as her big 5 year old belly was played with. Jenny could only smile happily back at her sister, loving how good her fat tummy felt and how good she knew she made her little sis feel.

After a while, the two children’s mother returned home. It was then Jenny….

Neither minded this look, bit Jenny was a little concerned that her sister might not have enough room to grow from all the eating she knew she would do at the buffet.

Jenny was distracted from these thoughts as she heard her mother calling for her and Jordan to come downstairs. Both kids didn’t need any further encouragement, and quickly ran down the stairs. 11413122.content:
Jordan couldn’t help but be a bit worried. She might have been a hungry, big-tummied little girl, but she still had her limits. She knew Jenny would keep feeding her until she begged her to stop. Her older sister was usually pretty good about doing so but would often encourage her to eat more. However, Jordan knew Jenny would never hurt her and would make sure to stop before she got in pain.

Despite all of these fears, Jordan was getting very egger to eat. That resting she did on the couch and the long drive over had allowed her fat tummy a bit of time to grow hungry again. It also didn’t help that her mother was eating a very delicious looking spread right in front of her. It was almost teasing the fat little girl as she sat empty handed and empty bellied.

Fortunately, Jenny soon arrived with her food. It was a good thing the older sis arrived when she did, as she caught Jordan trying to sneak a handful of her mother’s food without the adult knowing. Jenny could only giggle at this as she set down the first helping in front of Jordan: all 4 plates heaping full of delicious food.

Jordan drooled at the sight of so much tasty food and attacked the first plate before Jenny could even get it on the table.

Jordan thought for a moment more before she looked at all the yum food she hadn’t yet tried. Being such a big eater, she couldn’t wait to get her hands on more of the tasty treats this buffet offered, even if she was a bit full. She gave her belly a readying rub and looked back at her egger sister.

“Okay. But get some new stuff for me to try.” The plump little girl said licking her lips at the thought.

Jordan watched as Jenny grinned happily and rushed off to fulfill her request. Jordan was starting to have some second thoughts about her decision, knowing her sister was probably going to bring back a great deal of food. However, she was looking forward to sampling some of the other dishes this buffet had. She had to admit, the food here was pretty good.

She looked down at her food stuffed belly and couldn’t help but grin. It was a sight she was getting used to seeing more and more and it was one she was beginning to interpret as good. This was mostly because of much her older sister loved her belly stuffed with food, but Jordan had to admit, she was beginning to love it too.

This yanked Jordan out of her thoughts amking her just stare at the plate. For one it was hte biggest plate the buffet had and second all the food on it. She was right. Her sister overdid it. But she was now almost determined to eat it all. Besides, it would be wrong to let down her very excited sister. She picked up a fork andd began to eat. Before she knew it half of the plate was gone. She took a big sip of her drink and continued. Now her belly was clearly showing between her shirt and pants. 114131221122.content:
Jordan grinned at what her sister said. With this the rounded little girl had been given the motivation she needed finish the plate.

She quickly dove into her portion with renewed vigor. However, as much as she might have wanted to gobble down the rest of her food, this faster pace of eating slowly faded into a much slower one. That didn’t mean she wasn’t going to finish. She hadn’t stopped eating, only ate more slowly.

She got into rhythm of taking a bite, chewing for a long while and swallowing it down before repeating the process. While less quickly than before, this method seemed to work. Jordan finally put the last piece of food into her mouth, chewed for a really long time and slowly swallowed it down into her belly. She let out an overly full burp and moan as she looked down at her belly.

The instant second Jenny and Jordan’s eyes hit the stomach, both knew it had been worth the effort. It was quite tight and was more “rounded” than either had seen before. Not only that but the slight gap between pants and shirt had now turned into a large section of little girl blubber which now showed off the younger sibling’s belly button.

Jordan didn’t say a word but quickly began to rub her younger sister’s belly. She knew what to do to make Jordan feel more comfortable. Not only this, but Jenny couldn’t help but want to feel her younger sister’s belly a bit.

Jenny got up and went to get to the line to get her chubby stuffed sister another plate of food. She ignored the " little bit" part and loaded her plate up like all the others. She was really hoping that Jordan could push herself just a little more and be able to fit this last plate of food it her already tight round stuffed tummy. Jordan gulped at the large plate that was set before her. She was really stuffed right now and her young tummy didn’t know if it could hold this much food. She knew her sister would do something like this. She was always trying to make her bigger, not that Jordan minded. I mean she knew Jenny would let her stop if she really needed to and she did love being fat.

Jordan decided the best way to start was to down the soda. She grabbed the cup with two hands and quickly began to drink it. Her belly sloshed forward slightly more with each and every gulp she took. Her tummy also got more and more “sloshy” with every gulp as well.

The cute fat girl let out a nice big burp as she took the empty cup away from her lips. Now that all that air was out of her, she felt she could fit a bit more inside. She quickly began in on the large plate, trying to eat fast to avoid being full.

Her plan worked for a little bit. She was able to finish about half the plate before she had to slow down. She kept up her eating but not for long. As fat and hungry as Jordan was, she was still just too full to keep brining the food to her mouth. She let out an overly filled belch right at Jenny. “I’m too full.”

I mean she knew Jenny would let her stop if she really needed to and she did love being fat.

Jordan decided the best way to start was to down the soda. She grabbed the cup with two hands and quickly began to drink it. Her belly sloshed forward slightly more with each and every gulp she took. Her tummy also got more and more “sloshy” with every gulp as well.

The cute fat girl let out a nice big burp as she took the empty cup away from her lips. Now that all that air was out of her, she felt she could fit a bit more inside. She quickly began in on the large plate, trying to eat fast to avoid being full.

Her plan worked for a little bit. She was able to finish about half the plate before she had to slow down. She kept up her eating but not for long. As fat and hungry as Jordan was, she was still just too full to keep brining the food to her mouth. She let out an overly filled belch right at Jenny. She looked up at her older sister and quickly said,

“I’m too full.”

Jenny just chuckled, knowing her sis might have trouble. She nodded at her and lightly placed a hand on her stuffed kid belly and replied,

“Don’t worry. I’ll…”
11413122112222.title: She cant do it

114131221122222.content:
"I'll rub your belly. It should make more room for you to finish the rest." Jorden liked that idea a lot and shook her head in agreement.

Jenny began to rub circles around her sisters little big gut. Jorden moaned a little from how wonderful it felt. This wasn't the first time this had happened. Any time Jorden was bursting at the seams, her sister was there for her.

After 2 minutes the 5 year olds belly felt much better and she was able to finish her food. "Good job sis, way to go." There mother was watching and thought it was very cute. "Well seems my little growing girl is all filled up." There mother patted Jordens belly which made her wince in pain a little.

Jenny was surprised when her mother put a plate in front of her. "Make sure you get your fill as well, Jorden isn't the only girl that has growing to do." Jenny was caught off guard and looked a little nervous.
114131221122222.title: Belly rub

choices: something happens while she is drinking
1142.content:
"After all that food I am really thirsty"said Jordan

"Ok I will get you some coke" said Jenny walking into the kitchen

When Jenny got back into the room she was holding a whole 2 littler of coke.

"Think you can finish this" asked Jenny

"I think so" said Jordan underesimating exacly how much drink it was

Jenny put the bottle to Jordan's lips and held it, so even if she wanted to stop she could not. With every gulp she took you could see her belly push up a little more. Between the amount of drink and the carbonation in the drink her already stuffed and bulging tummy was getting absoluly huge.
Can she finish it?
1142.title: Her Sister is thirsty

11421.content:
Jordan finished the whole bottle and let out a giant burp, making her sister laugh. Jordan laughed too and began to think. "You know," she said after a moment, "getting fat like this is really fun. How about you let me feed you too and we can get fat together? We could even see which of us can become the fattest."

Jenny was surprised, having never thought of this before. She also liked the idea of friendly competition with her sister. But could she really do it?
11421.title: yes

choices: Jenny put up a goal list for Jordan
She tries to feed Jordan more
11422.content:
"Come on drink it."

But then Jenny saw the look on Jordan's face. She looked troubled and a bit blue. Fast she stopped and Jordan was breathing very deep. Jenny looked worried at her. She did't wanted too hurt Jordan or let her choke.

"Is everything okay with you Jordan?" She asked worried looking at her right in front of her face.

"BUUUUURRRRRRRP!!!" Jordan belched right in her sisters face what caused Jenny to laugh.

"Jenny i don't.... think i can... finish it."

"Really?" Jenny asked disappointed. "Well all right then if your sure."

She put the bottle of cola back in the refrigerator. She walked back too Jordan. She looked smiling at her.

"All right Jordan it's time for... it."

I think you all wonder what 'it' is. Don't worry it is't sex or porn. It's something what Jenny liked too do since she started fattening Jordan exactly four weeks ago.

"Come on Jordan. Let's go you like it don't you?"

"Well yeah. I think it's pretty funny." Jordan said and giggled.

They went up too Jenny's room. Jenny's room was't different from any other eight year old girls room. All right it was a mess but which room of a eight year old girl is't. There was a bed and one chair and two beanbag chairs. A bookcase filled with books for kids. Jenny liked reading. Especially stories about fat people. There was also a desk with a computer and a big box that was used to put in her toys that were lying everywhere in the room and further some posters on the wall. Nothing extraordinary.

She took her camera. She got one at her seventh birthday. She could make pretty good pictures. But the most important reason was that she liked fat girls. When she saw fat people somewhere she just took their picture and kept it in a small pile in a drawer. She always locked this drawer but now she opened it. She took out a small map. In it were a few pictures of her sister attached too some paper with up it her sister,s weight, height and measurements, and under that was another but now she was a bit heavier. Every two weeks Jenny weighed and measured her sister to see her process. When Jordan would be a obese girl she would have a beautiful report about her gaining.
The only thing she did't like was that she had just one little sister. Well she planned to get kids. She could of course fatten them up. She also thought about babysitting when she was older and then fatten those kids up a bit but that had too wait until she was older.

All right Jordan look at me and say: i'm fat!"

"I'm fat!" Jordan said and Jenny took the picture.

"Great. Now without the shirt. All right Jordan take of that shirt so we can see your belly."

Jordan did as she was told and also unbuttoned her pants so they would't hold in her belly.

Jenny took another picture what clearly showed the bugle in her sisters belly. She took a few more. Some from the front and some from the sides and some in a sitting position.

"Yeah those look great."

She took a measurement and wrapped it around her sisters belly, thighs,chest and arms and wrote everything carefully on another piece of paper. and put it in the map and put it back in the drawer and closed it carefully and looked at her sister.

"Great Jordan you really gained."

'How will i look over two months?"

"I hope a lot fatter."

"And over five, and over seven and over a year?"

"Jordan sweetie i don't know. Everyone gains different. Some gain faster then others and of course how much and what you eat."

Jordan smiled and jenny tried to image a sister who was way fatter. She liked the idea.
11422.title: Jordans gaining process

114222.content:
Jenny took Jordan over to a bean bag chair and put her into it.

"Time to get started!" she said, giggling.

With her sister settled comfortably Jenny went to her special drawer and took out a large box of cookies, loaded with chocolate chips. She also grabbed some of the pictures of fat people that she had collected and brought them both to her sister.

"Here Jordan, sit back like this." She carefully spread her legs and leaned her back in the bean bag so that she would stick her belly out more.

With that accomplished she opened the box of cookies, but first handed her sister the pictures of fat people.

Teasingly she held out a cookie while she particularly showed a picture of a huge woman she had seen at the beach with a bikini (barely) on. All her fat was on show, but the woman looked happy.

"Imagine getting this big Jordan? Imagine all the wonderful food you could fit in your tummy...."

Jordan gasped at the big ladys photo and looked down at her own (already stuffed) belly, as her sister brought the first fat-laden cookie closer. COuld she really be that big? But she wanted to make her sister happy, and the fat lady did look so happy....

With a swift move Jenny brought the cookie to Jordans mouth and her sister bit down happily, munching on it like she hadn't eaten all day.

"Good girl!" her sister praised, and began to bring more to her mouth. Son they had settled into a rhythm- Jenny would bring more cookies up while rubbing her sisters belly, while Jordan greedily chomped on the treats and looked at her sisters stash of fat people pics with more and more interest.

Jenny continued to encourage her, especially as her sister was slowing down. She had so much food in her gut already it was a wonder she had fit anything in.

'We are going to feed you every day, and you will get fat in no time!'

'Mmhmm!' said a happy Jordan, who was thoroughly enjoying herself. She had already begun to think about what she would look like with a bigger, jiggly belly just like the pictures.

Finally with a solid effort Jenny crammed the last cookie into her waiting sisters mouth and stepped back to look at her handiwork. Jordan laid back in the bean bag, had both hands holding onto her ever more swollen belly (covered in crumbs), and was moaning happily.

Jenny couldn't help but feel excitement at what she had created, her sister was clearly enjoying herself and had already begun to begin her fattening journey
114222.title: She tries to feed Jordan more

choices: A perfectly round, firm, pregnant like belly
A hanging, flabby belly with rolls forming
1142221.content:
It was early morning but you wouldnt have known it by Jennys' energy and happy smile, she was heading to her darling sisters room with an armful of food, as fatty as she could sneak in.

She carefully opened the door and closed it behind her just as quietly, walking over to her sisters' bed where the slumbering fatty in progress started to stir with her approach.

Jenny marvelled at what she had created. Jordan was almost always awake as soon as she entered, ready for her morning feeding. Carefully Jenny took the covers off as her sister sat up in bed with a sleepy smile on her face, spreading her legs automatically as though to let her belly spill out.

Without a word Jenny held out the first moresel- a greasy, moist chocolate cake, loaded with precious fat and sugar to bulk up Jordan more and more.

So the rythym began, as it had for two months. Jordan would messily eat down whatever Jenny gave her until she couldnt repeat the process anymore. But Jenny would always either coax her into eating more or force a little more in, reminding her that she couldnt get fat if she didnt put in the effort- no pain, no gain!

All throughout the days for the last two months Jenny had kept up her stuffing her sister silly, with anything fattening she could lay her hands on. And it showed. Every day Jenny would measure, weigh and take her pictures and each picture semed bigger than the next.

One day Jenny had gone into her room to prepare for the 'thing' only to find Jordan already in there, admiring her growing gut in the mirror and repeating 'im fatter!', happily jiggling it for her sister. The two had both enjoyed that measuring session and weigh in more than usual.

In the present, Jenny was dreamily thinking of her sisters progress as Jordan continued eagerly making a pig out of herself. Soon maybe she would have belly big enough to have a fat girls' waddle. The thought make Jenny weak at the knees- she could see it clear in her mind.

The sun was shining faintly through the curtain of Jordans' room, coating the two girls with soft light. The only sound was soft chewing and the occasional small moan from the hungry girl as she enjoyed her morning ritual.

Their mom had no inkling of why the youngest was looking softer and didnt seem to be fitting her clothes properly anymore- or why the food bill was so high- but the girls were spending so much time together that she was just happy they were getting along so well.

After the sustained feeding Jordan finally began to reach her limit, and Jenny was not inclined to push her too hard in the morning first thing- that was reserved for bedtime feeding, when Jordan would fall into a food coma painfully stuffed- bloated, messy and loving every second of it.

With the last morsel safely in her tummy, Jordan reclined back fully with a wonderfully blissful look on her face, preparing for the next stage of morning feeding. Jenny picked up a small bottle of lotion- which she would give her sisters growing belly a proper rub down with. This would help her skin stay soft and hope stretch better.

With a gentle effort Jenny lifted up Jordans shirt revealing her wonderful new belly. It was Jennys favourite kind as well-
1142221.title: Skip forward two months

11422212.content:
Jenny rubbed the flabby rolls of her sisters' belly with tender care, getting lotion into every nook and cranny.

Jordan held her shirt up for her sister while this was ongoing, with a wonderfully relaxed smile on her face. Her flabbier face and puffier cheeks were giving her a natural pout, which Jenny absolutely loved- it made her gain more evident.

The sisters talked quietly as Jenny moisturized the flabby gut, deliberately jiggling it the whole time which made Jordan giggle.

'You are getting more fat every day sis, I couldn't be happier with your progress!' Jenny cooed happily.

To her surprise, Jordan frowned. 'Jenny, I love being this fat, but I don't have a big enough belly yet! It needs to be faster!'

Her sisters eyes' bulged. 'What do you mean?'

Jordan pouted her chubby face more. 'I want to look like THIS!' She pulled out from under her pillow the picture of the very fat woman in the red bikini which Jenny had shown her two months before. 'I love her so much! Look at her flabby tummy- you can't see her underwear from the front! Mine you can!'

Suddenly Jordan heaved herself up from the bed, and stood in the room, taking off her shirt and leaving her in her underwear only.

'See? You can see it still! I want it to hang down and cover completely!' Jenny had not seen her sister this sad since before she started gaining.

'Oh baby don't worry, you will get that big!!' Jenny hugged her sister, which cheered her up. Secretly, Jenny was absolutely ecstatic, Jordan was basically demanding to be plumped up.

Jenny began thinking. Jordan was already being stuffed daily as best as she could. It then hit her- if Jordan was to be coached more into eating- or become lazier and move less- then the weight would pile on.

It was time to see what Jordan wanted. Jenny really wanted her sister to be happy.

'Jordan, do you know the lady you have the photograph of?' Jordan nodded. 'Well, I know her and can take you to visit her!

Her sisters' jaw dropped and all sadness went from her face.

'If you want we can go today, as soon as mom leaves for work! Or....' Jenny grinned wickedly..'we can have a lazy day together and get you even fatter to see her!'
11422212.title: A hanging, flabby belly with rolls forming

info.description:
This is a story about a girl who has started to fatten up her little 5 year old sister.

Rules

No male weight gain

No unrealistic forms of weiht gain like magic

No unrealistc gains like 500 pounds in one day or in one siting

No instint efects like her arms started to get fatter while she is still eating, give it a day or two to take afect however she can get very bloated and her belly get bigger while eating.

No sex stuff, nudity is allowed but not deatailed

Please make as long as chapters as you can, no two line parts

Force feeding is encouraged

Have fun
